title: Loot

replies.body: Thnx, but I logged back in  and it reappeared in loot but i thought i had two keys tho :(.
At least I have my chests

I was looking through your account history, and I'm not seeing where any chests might have disappeared. I wonder if you were possibly talking about a different account since it doesn't seem like this one lost any hextech loot. Hit me back up and let me know if you were referring to a different account!
